players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I believe we should be cautious and focus on identifying any suspicious behavior among us. Alice's silence during the investigation is concerning."
Bob: "I agree with Diana's assessment. Let's keep a close eye on each other and report any unusual behavior we observe."
Bob: "I think we should all try to be more open and communicate with each other. Silence can sometimes lead to suspicion, and we don't want that in our village."
You: "I will remain silent. Let's see if anyone else makes a move today."
